title: The Lintz Disclosure
outcome: Oksana Lintz, pressured by public anger and ongoing tensions, releases the full archive of BCI abuse records. The wave of revelations unravels hidden injustices and triggers demands for reparations, apologies, and new forms of truth commissions, forcing the Council to reckon with deep wounds as citizens demand authentic reconciliation.

events.description: Oksana Lintz publishes the full archive of past BCI abuses, including denial records, flagged citizen lists, and evidence of errors in behavioral scoring.
Protests and vigils erupt citywide as groups of wrongly flagged citizens and their families demand reparations, apologies, and leadership change.
Community assemblies organize public truth commissions, inviting Council members to answer for the system’s failures and participate in restorative justice sessions.
Council factions debate how to acknowledge abuses. Directorate members call for secrecy, while Harmonists and Innovators propose public reparations and oversight reforms.
A citywide declaration commits to abolishing centralized behavioral scoring, with promises of permanent citizen oversight and remembrance of past victims.
